alert.note: Alert for Calhoun (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 11:02AM CST until February 24 at 2:24AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yalobusha River at Calhoun City For the Yalobusha River...including Calhoun City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yalobusha River at Calhoun City. * WHEN...From this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Widespread lowland and agricultural flooding is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 23.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 17.2 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
